heroAbout: Hi, I`m Ege Y覺ld覺r覺m. I`m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great use experiences. Let's shake hands with me.

skillsData.name: JavaScript
skillsData.description: JavaScript is a powerful programming language used to create dynamic content on web pages.

skillsData.name: React.Js
skillsData.description: React is a component-based JavaScript library used to build user interfaces.

skillsData.name: Node.Js
skillsData.description: Node.js is a platform that allows JavaScript to be run on the server side. It is ideal for building high-performance applications.

skillsData.name: VS Code
skillsData.description: Visual Studio Code is a popular code editor for software development. It offers a user-friendly interface and supports many extensions.

skillsData.name: Redux
skillsData.description: Redux is a library used for managing application state. It is commonly used with React applications.

skillsData.name: Figma
skillsData.description: Figma is an online design tool used for UI design and prototyping. It makes collaboration among teams easier.

skillsData.name: TailwindCss
skillsData.description: Tailwind CSS is a CSS framework used to quickly create customized user interfaces. It stands out with its utility-first approach.
